睜一眼閉一眼.pinyin: zhēng yī yǎn bì yī yǎn

睜一隻眼閉一隻眼.pinyin: zhēng yī zhī yǎn bì yī zhī yǎn

睜眼說瞎話.definition: (idiom) to lie through one's teeth; to talk drivel

睜著眼睛說瞎話.definition: (idiom) to lie through one's teeth; to talk drivel
